intro: Enter a mecha and monster-filled world from the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade team
description:
Battle Suit Aces is a charming card-battling RPG. You'll recruit, befriend, and upgrade your mech pilots on a heartfelt hunt for fabled alien superweapons: the Relic Suits. Command them across monster-infested galactic wilds through danger, tragedy, and comedic sci-fi shenanigans.

• Embark on a personalized adventure full of memorable fully-voiced characters

• Carefully guide your eager pilots to win streamlined 5 vs 5 card battles

• Add to your deck from 5 specialist Factions and mod them into a synergistic team

The Second Voice is calling. Will you listen?
